text: Hi Royal Avila, thanks for your service,  your resort is one of my favourite spot to be, first impression waktu aku sama temen aku iseng jalan² sekitaran pantai malimbu, hari pertama aku tour ke Lombok tapi sayangnya aku GK nginep di royal Avila, aku nginep nya di Aruna Senggigi, jadi sorenya aku main deh di beachclubnya royal avila, staf nya di lobby pada asik semua, ramah bangettt, aku inget banget namanya yg handle aku pertama kali itu sampe   selesai dri beachclubnya  klo ga salah mas "Reggy ,mas nya ramah bangett asik di ajakin becanda, komunikatif bangett dia, anyway beachclubnya aku demen bangett di temenin live DJ kerenn bangettt, fix, next month holiday aku main kesini lagi, recommended banget buat sunset relaxing lokasinya hotell ini mahh😍
title: Hi Royal Avila, thanks for your service,  your resort is one of my favourite spot to be, first impression waktu aku sama

text: Kami menginap tgl 24 - 26 maret, sebelumnya kami memilih hotel ini karena lihat you tub ya bobo cantik. Ternyata aslinya dari hotel ini tidak mengecewakan dan sesuai ekspektasi, View nya bagus sekali, kamar bersih dan ok, pelayanan staff bagus. Tidak menyesal menginap disini, apabila ke Lombok lg kami berencana menginap di royal avila lagi
title: Hotel yang bagus view dan arsitekturnya

text: Royal Avila, merupakan tempat penginapan / resort yang mampu memanjakan para pengunjung dengan beberapa kategori diantaranya pelayanannya yang ramah, lingkungan yang bagus & kamar yang nyaman, sehingga mampu membuat pengunjung betah dan ingin me-repeat kembali untuk staycation di tempat ini.
title: The Greatest of Royal Avila Boutique Resort

text: Althea Spa fasilitas dan treatmentnya bagus banget, Terimakasih Mbak Yuni, ramah, baik, dan massage nya enak sekali. Jacuzzinya bagus banget, airnya jg hangat. Sangat sangat recommended untuk Spa Experience di Lombok. 🤍
title: Althea Spa Experience

text: salah satu hotel yg menakjubkan , pool yg sangat indah , semua staff sangat membantu , dari baru checkin sampe dikamar dibantu banget, kolam super indah , dibsuguhin pemandangan yg langsung menghadap laut. kamar super aesthetic , anak-anak super happy !
title: gamau pulang😭

text: Santorini ada di Lombok😍 Hotel yg super keren, mengutamakan kenyamanan tamu. dari segi service yg luar biasa , semua staff ramah bgttt, kamar dan interior sampai amenitiesnya tertata dengan sempurna✨
title: amazing resort

text: Bersih sekali, lokasi strategis, sangat bersih, pemandangan nya luar biasa , pelayanan sangat ramah, mudah di cari lokasinya, karyawan nya ramah dan bersahabat, kamarnya bersih sekali, kamarnya besar dan nyaman,, makanannya enak dan harga nya terjankau
title: Nyaman bngat

text: Luar biasa bersih, layanan memuaskan, pemandangan laut yang luar biasa, sangat rekomendasi untuk liburan keluarga,harga worted bangat, makanan juga sesuai selera, pemandangan hamparan laut luas yang sangat bersih, recomended destitation👍👍👍👍
title: Nice View

text: Pelayanan bagus semua serta fasilitas lengkap dan istimewa. Letak hotel yang strategis membuat hotel ini cocok untuk dijadikan kumpul" keluarga atau kerabat". Lokasi yang santai yang cocok untuk orang" yang ingin menikmati alam & fasilitas hotel yang lengkap.
title: Good holiday at Royal avila

photos.caption: Pengalaman sehabis spa & jaccuzi yang dilayani oleh masseuse Yanti 👍

text: The best and cozy hotel ever selama nginap di lombok, pelayanan nya terbaik , hotel bersih kolam bersih, kamar nya nyaman , pemandangan nya ga usah diragukan lagi pokoknya worth to being here dengan harga nya
title: Cozy avila

text: Sungguh pengalaman yang sangat menyenangkan menginap di hotel Royal Avila di Lombok..disuguhkan pemandangan yang keren dan pelayanan yang sangat friendly membuat kami sangat nyaman..fasilitas hotel juga sangat lengkap dan memanjakan kami
title: Review Hotel Royal Avila Lombok

text: luar biasa pelayanan, kamar dan makanan nya terbaik , staff ramah - ramah , fasilitas lengkap , pokoknya puas , harga terbilang worth dari semua fasilitas dan kenyamanan hotel bintang 5 ............... thank you royal Avila pasti balik lagi..
title: terima kasih staff mba nia.. semua staff nya ramahh murah senyumm.......

text:
Tempat nyaman dan ok, cocok untuk keluarga menikmati liburan🥰 dan kolam renangnya bagus anak2 suka berenang sambil menikmati sunset
Staff ramah,bagus terutama staff receptionist mb sasa,ulfa,made dan ocim
title: Better place for holiday

text:
view bagus dengan view laut , suasana  yang tenang , kamar sangat  bersih ...staf yang helpful terutama di restoran dan room service
Area Lobby dan Area restoran dapat digunakan untuk menikmati sunset 
Over all good
title: over all bagus ,

text: Kamar, aminities, perlengkapan semuanya sangat baik. Pelayanan cepat, respon kebutuhan tamu cepat. Makanan sangat enak, semoga ke depan breakfast bisa buffet. Seluruh staf ramah. Everything is good. Thank you.
title: Good place

text:
View kamar yg bagus saat sunset, dekorasi ala santorini,
Pelayan yg sangat ramah, private pool dengan pemandangan sunset yg indah, 
Sarapan dgn menu mediteran yg bervariatif

Tks team AVILA, pengalaman yg luar biasa
title: Great

text: Kamar fasilitas. Layanan bagus pemandangan laut yang indah . Suasana yang santai tenang sehingga  Cocok di jadikan sebagai tempat untuk liburan bersama keluarga dan cocok untuk juga untuk perjalananan bisnis
title: Kamar fasilitas bagus

text:
Hotel dgn gaya Santorini serta interior yg lain daripada yg lain, menarik dan tertata rapi, apalagi view sunset dari kolam renang yg luar biasa.
Para Staff yg ramah dan siap membantu. Terima Kasih untuk Mba Ulfa dan Mba Haeniah yg sudah melayani dgn baik. 
Kamar yg elegan dan bersih. Akan datang ingin mengulangi kembali. Sukses selalu.
title: Hotel dengan gaya Santorini serta view sunset yang luar biasa.

text: Hotelnya keren bagus desain arsitekturnya, makanannya rata2 enak2 smua, smua staff ramah dan bersahabat sekali, 2 kali berkunjung sudah akrab dengan anak saya, mulai dr resepsionis, restauran hingga staff kamar smua profesional pelayanannya over all fasilitas sesuai dengan harga, pesan langsung dapat bonusnya ++. Yg utama sunset disini keren ga ada lawan. Trimakasih royal avilla hmembuat babymoon saya berkesan sekali
title: Babymoon

text: Semua staf ramah. Makanannya enak2. Kamarnya bersih. Desain interior dan eksteriornya bagus, pemilihan warnanya cakep. Viewnya sunsetnya cakeeeeeeep bgt. Kami sekeluarga nyaman dan suka disini. Kalo pesen gofood harus ambil sendiri, it's okey sih scr itu kebijakan hotel. Lagian jg bisa jalan2 dr kamar ke lobi plus poto2 view hotel yg Tjakeep..
title: Great hotel, great view..

text: Tempatnya bagus banget.ga nyesel pilih tempat ini buat Couple / family.bikin nagih extend nginap lagi,😂🥰😍.makasih buat pelayanannya mba2 mas2.mudah-mudahan tahun berikutnya kita bisa jumpa lagi ya.
title: Vaction / Honeymoon

text: Hotelnya Nyaman banget, view bagus, staff ramah2 dan helpfull tempat bersih  amenities lengkap, makanan di resto enak2 semua.. penyajian cepat.. breakfast ala charte tp worth bgt, view sunset dr pool dan jacuzzi paling best.. very recomended.. pasti kesini lg klo ke lombok lg
title: Best view in lombok

owner_response.text:
Kepada Ibu/Bapak 548rizkyy,

Salam hangat dari Royal Avila Boutique Resort

Terimakasih telah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis ulasan tentang hotel kami, kami senang mengetahui jika Ibu/Bapak mendapatkan pengalaman yang berkesan selama menginap di hotel kami sehingga Ibu/Bapak tidak segan untuk merekomendasikan hotel kami.

Ulasan ini akan menjadi motivasi bagi kami untuk terus menjaga standarisasi kualitas dari servis kami.

Besar harapan bisa menyambut kembali Ibu/Bapak di Royal Avila Boutique Resort pada waktu mendatang.

Hormat kami,
Team Royal Avila Boutique Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hotel dgn vibes yg luar biasa. Unik, mewah, ramah, segerrr semuanya menyatu. Hari pertama masuk kamarnya adl pengalaman yg tak terlupakan. Warna dekornya buagus, kasurnya nyaman, lighting oke, kamar mandi bersih, wangi, pemandangan alam sempurna, infinity pool yg ciamik aplg kestu jam set 6 pagi masih sepi jd suara ombak sangat terdengar dan pemandangan lautnya nagihin banget. Staff nya cepet dan ramah bgt aplg mas Fathur dan mb Komang. Mksih ya mas, mbak. Smg ada kesempatan lg biar bisa nginep disana. Wes pokok.e highly recomended.
title: Must be your choice

owner_response.text:
Kepada Ibu/Bapak Mei_S_M_S

Salam hangat dari Royal Avila Boutique Resort

Terimakasih telah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis ulasan tentang hotel kami, kami senang mengetahui jika Ibu/Bapak mendapatkan pengalaman yang berkesan selama menginap di hotel kami sehingga Ibu/Bapak tidak segan untuk merekomendasikan hotel kami.

Ulasan ini akan menjadi motivasi bagi kami untuk terus menjaga standarisasi kualitas dari servis kami. Dan kami berharap bisa menyambut kembali Ibu/Bapak di Royal Avila Boutique Resort pada waktu mendatang.

Hormat kami,
Team Royal Avila Boutique Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Berkunjung ke Lombok sekarang ada banyak hal yang baru, selain Sirkuit Mandalika yang Go Internasional, sekarang ada Hotel dan Resort baru berkonsep seperti Santorini, semua serba putih dan biru.
Lokasinya tepat di Area Senggigi dan menghadap matahari Barat, jadi sudah pasti kita bisa menikmati Sunset yang indah, apalagi ditambah posisi Sunset nya langsung menghadap Gunung Agung dari pulau Bali.
Salah satu kelebihan lainnya dari Royal Avila adalah kamarnya punya balkon yang sangat cantik dan langsung menghadap laut lepas, jadi ketika kita bangun tidur dan membuka tirai kita, suara ombak dan matahari Lombok sudah menyambut kita.
Selain itu, banyak spot lainnya yang bisa kita pakai untuk sekedar Chill dan bersantai hampir disetiap pojokkan Hotel, pastinya sangat Instagramable.
Soal Resto pun beda dari kebanyakkan Hotel lainnya yang sekedar sebagai pelengkap, Resto yang ada di Royal Avila namanya Olive, menyediakan banyak menu mulai dari western hingga tradisional khas Lombok, dan biasanya juga ada Set Menu yang Special.
Yang pasti untuk Family Vacation sangat amat recommended sekali.
title: The New Gem in Lombok

owner_response.text:
Kepada Yth. hazmanonvacation

Salam hangat dari Royal Avila Boutique Resort

Terimakasih telah meluangkan waktu dan menulis ulasan tentang hotel kami, terlebih kami senang mengetahui jika Bapak/Ibu mendapatkan pengalaman yang berkesan selama menginap di hotel kami.

Kami nantikan kembali kedatangan Bapak/Ibu di Royal Avila Boutique Resort.

Salam,
Tim Royal Avila Boutique Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: Deluxe Room dengan Balkon langsung menghadap Laut
Deluxe Room dengan Balkon langsung menghadap Laut

text: Datang kesini bersama suami honeymoon part kesekian.The ambiance, service, and every detail here are awesome. I highly recommended it and will come back again when I to Lombok. Worth every penny 🥰🥰🥰
title: Althea Spa Royal Avila

text:
This Resort is astonishing and the Spa (Althea Spa) is very comfy, also the view makes you feel very comfortable.
The employees are also very helpful, kind and friendly.
Absolutely have to come back here one day.
title: Althea Spa by Royal Avila

text: Pas kesini lagi puasa, sepi banget berasa private. All the staff were very polite and nice. We love the whole ambience of this hotel, the architecture is very beautiful. The hotel is very clean and the hotel use the best quality furniture for the room.
title: Love our experience here

text: The view, the building, the room, the pool, everything is amazing and breathtaking. Really love the architecture of the building and every room in this hotel have a ocean view! So everyday you will wake up with the best view. Also the view is directly to the sunset so you can enjoy sunset everyday
title: Amazing stay in lombok

text: Besides the really good rooms, there is also a spa with a beach view! Honestly, this was my first experience and it turned out to be a lot more relaxing! In addition the sound of the waves on the beach is really relaxing too! And also, Thank you for the good service mba lia & mba yanti 🤎
title: Altheaspa by royal avila

text: The view of this hotel is perfect, especially sunset view from pool. We also have dinner on our first day , the food is great, the live music at the olive restaurant also good. Room not too spacious but still okay, our room got ocean view , which is very nice. Breakfast also good even though the breakfast is ala carte but the bread juice and food are great
title: Hotel with great sunset view

text: This villa is beyond beautiful. The hospitality of the staff, level of cleanliness, the view, the food, everything is the best and better than what you can imagine. Every spot of the villa is pleasing to the eye, we can see the ocean directly from our bedroom. The infinity & jacuzzi pool is pristine and the building is santorini-inspired but all with modern tools and equipment. I highly recommend you to try this villa at least once in a lifetime.
title: Too good to be true ❤️

text: Had my first experience staying at Lombok, and what excellence experience I have in Royal Avila. All the view just perfect! The service from the staff overall is great. Would love to come come back here again soon! :) And to anyone wanting to visit Lombok, Royal Avila is an absolute must.
title: Unforgettable Stay

text: The best resort in Lombok i've ever visited. the room is spacious, good taste of food espc. their breakfast, sleek + aesthetic area. All the staff is very responsive, we have full access for every facilities: from the gym cenfer, 24 hours boogy services. Thank you for the hospitality, Royal Avila!
title: Best Resort in Lombok!

text: Very good hotel.  New and with a great view overlooking the ocean.  Had spa in altheaspa.  Very good experience, beautiful view from the jacuzzi.  We choose the couple soul touch treatement.  Great therapist: Putri and Yanti.
title: Royal abvila.  Recommendeing a great hotel and spa experience with a killer view.  Great for couples for a quick gateawa

text:
I love this place!! 

It feels good to look at the sea from the bathtub.

Food was also very good. Had dinner and breakfast, both were good.

The staff were very kindly and we had a wonderful holiday. thank you :)
title: I love this place!!

text:
It was my great experience and memorable stay at Royal Avila Boutique Resort. Such a paradise on earth. All staffs and facilities are extremely perfect. 

Thanks to Mas Ociem and Team who were treating me such as  a VIP on my special day.  My friend was amazed, every staffs knew that i was on birthday (even buggy drivers and SPA Therapists).  I got surprise on breakfast time and room was decorated beautifully. Honestly, It was above my expectation . 

The beach club is also nice. I was staying on weekday, so it was like a private beach club :) Unfortunaley, i didnt explore all the facilities. 

Once again, thanks to All Royal Avila Boutique Resort Team. Definitely i would back and highly recommended to other travellers. Good Job and Please keep it up!!
Cheers
Agung R.
title: The best place to stay in Lombok

text: The hotel was superb! I had amazing experience during my stay at Royal Avila, the pool is cool and the view will makes you don’t want to go anywhere else. The hotel is totally worth the price. All the staff are nice and well dedicated to the guest. Even though you have to use buggy to go to the room, but it was still fine. The only thing is no sauna at the gym and the gym has small amount of the equipment, but that’s fine because the view will make you enough of everything.
title: Spend more time at the Hotel, just don’t go anywhere else id you don’t want to be regret.

photos.caption: The Breakfast is A La Carte but taste delicious

text: The place is clean and beautiful, it has a wonderful exterior and interior design. The room has an amazing view, the food was great and all staffs provide an excellent hospitality. The golden hour view during the sunset was unforgettable! I had a pleasant stay, thank you Royal Avila! Will be back again for sure ☺︎
title: Royal Avila Lombok, Indonesia

text:
Royal Avila was amazing place to stay. 

The scenery, service, food, are excellent! The bed, bathroom, and the view from my balcony was beautiful. Location is incredible. Definetely will come back soon to this place. Thank you Royal Avila!✨
title: Beautiful place to stay💛

text: Upon from the first day of entrance till throughout the whole stay, hospitality has been top notch. A big great thanks Dewa Putra, Buggy driver Reggy and also alot of other families of Royal Avila whom names I can’t recall has made this stay memorable yet comfortable. Looking forward to staying here again on the next Lombok visit again :) before I forget, the views here are too pretty and not to mention, the breakfast is one of the best I experienced ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: A service of a reputable villa you will get in a 5 Star Hotel

photos.caption: An awesome breakfast menu that is prepared on the spot instead of ready-made which. Not to mention it is very delicious 👍🏽

text:
Reviewed a couple of villas and this was one of the choices in our list and definitely no regrets for choosing them at all! Pictures and videos online was amazing but when we reached here, we were even more impressed by the beauty of this place. Simply breathtaking.
They also manage to accomodate a room that we’ve requested upon booking with easy access for us due to our elderly parents that was with us during our stay here. Very thoughtful.

The room that we’ve booked was clean and well maintained.
The Staff who orientate us initially was well versed in orientation - not only the room but all the service they provide here, event that is currently they are having. (Didn’t get his name down!)

Ultimately the service was tiptop ever since we arrived here. Every one of the staff here is extremely friendly and polite, fully well trained. Special mention to one of the Staff Putra for being very attentive to our needs and accomdating to us throughout our stay here. 
Reggy for being a smiley and very friendly on every of our buggy ride! Really enjoy a lovely short buggy ride!!
And also the guy whom we didn’t get his name down during our first day check in!

Can’t wait to come back here again in the future for our next vacation, definitely worth the splurge!
title: Royal Avila was one of breathtaking beauty !

text: It was a very pleasant experiance staying at the royal avila hotel in lombok .. with cool views and friendly service from the spa staff, atheaspa miss yanti , lia and yuni made us very comfortable.. the hotel facilities were also very complete and pampered
title: Royal avila is beautyful place

text: Althea spa the place is very nice,clean,the view is amazing,the staff  are yuni,yanti,lia very friendly,and veiw in the jacuzzi is very nice,this hotel is really worth visiting the room are very spacious and comfortable.
title: Royal avila amazing place

text: Beautiful hotel, great ambiance.  Jacuzzi and spa is very nice.  The infiniti pool and view is amazing.  Great staff and service.  Very nice and relaxing place. Top place to stay in Lombok, u will love it
title: Luxury stay

text: The room is decent and comfy. The balcony is the best, we can enjoy the infinity sea. The building is new so everything is so fresh. The pool is so beautiful, with breathtaking view. Also there is a beach club available here so you literally don’t need to go anywhere else!
title: Pleasant stay and pretty natural scenery.

text: I love stay at royal Avila boutique resort in Lombok island. We had a good time and staff very helpful and friendly. room clean , we stay 1 night but i hope  I will come back here again.  The view so amazing, ocean blue 💙 and the best sunset view from this hotel. I love we royal Avila boutique resort
title: Romantic Couple

text: best spot to get the sunset, hopefully the sky will clear. nice view, nice place to stay, nice services,  nice hotel staff full of hospitality. will coming back soon to enjoy with the whole family. best of luck for you team!
title: honeymoon trip

text: I've visitted this place many times before yet i can say this is one of the best place to stay the concept is absolutely briliant by adopting mediteranian housing style with some slight touch of local culture design, very eye-catching yet beautiful. Located In the cliff edge gives new experience and sensation for spending time, the service are great and the cuisine also very diverse that suitable for everyone tastes. totally worth for another visit.
title: UnveilingLombok

text: Overall it's Good...Very Good Services..Hotel Staffs are very Friendly..Clean Room, definitely Come Back....All the facilities at Luxury Hotel have been design with Top Class properties.Panoramic restaurant and lounge with sweeping view of the sea
title: Royal Avila Malaka The Best Hotel at Senggigi

text: We stayed here for honeymoon and enjoyed every minute of it. Every staff member was friendly and ready to help in whatever way they could, and from checkin until checkout we were accompanied by very friendly staff, Ms. Sasa and Mas Wija. There was attention to details like extra coffee pods supplied (without requesting) when our preference was noted made us feel special. We made the most of the pool which was lovely ( 2 infinity pool ). Location must be the best in Lombok, Indonesia. We highly recommend this hotel and we’ll return when next in Lombok.
title: Best Experience

text:
The views are amazing. Staff super polite and very helpful, hotel is very clean and comfortable. 

We stayed 2 nights at the Penthouse, the room is amazing with very big living room and dining space. 

The food at hotel is nice, breakfast menu is delicious.

The stay overall was wonderful and we will definitely come back and stay again. 

Cheers to the staff and management.
title: Amazing property with very polite staff

text:
I was stayed here with my 5 family members for a short escape. We were sceptical at first since we had experienced the santorini like hotel at Bajo (Lo**al Collect***) and it was quite way far below our expectation. But, this time was different, this hotel offered so much joy and happiness to us. Its vibe, views, facilities, foods, all of them were superb! 

One thing that really stood up was how awesome the staffs were! The golf cart driver: Alex, the front desk officers, the restaurant staffs, the securities, all of them very friendly, helpfull and served us with their heart (if you have been to so many hotels, you kinda know the difference between a real smile and a fake one).

All in all, it was an awesome experience! Keep up the good work!!
title: Awesome staffs!

text:
Beauty beyond words, subhanAllah. Bravo to aesthetic, Hospitality is 5 start standard ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We booked the ocean view room for our honeymoon. The view is calming, and we feel very relaxed. Highly recommended for couples, as apart from the view, the toilet is also sexy. Room not recommended for family as shower is see through😜

Special thank you to above and beyond staffs: 

1) Mas Adi, staff driver/ guide, seruu kamu! Best! Very flexible and supporting. Recommend places for take aways and visits. Makasihh🙏🏻

2) Mas Putra, receptionist. I called in at very late hour to ask where we can get ART (Antigen Rapid Test) kit as my husband was having high fever. Most clinics, hospitals and pharmacies are closed at that hour. Despite the limited time, Mas Putra managed to find us a place to get the ART. Makasiih🙏🏻
title: Honeymoon Recommended

text:
My Lombok Holiday couldn’t be any better this time! We enjoyed every minute of our stay.

And Putra (at the reception) was the one who made our visit so perfect.

We came in early thinking that we had to wait, but we were happy to have some lunch with a great view and relaxed around the resort. The restaurant is magnificent with a fascinating view of Gili Islands and Mount Agung in Bali.

The beach club is very iconic, and from my point of view it has the best music in Lombok.

The cliff pool room was gorgeous. Breakfast was DELICIOUS!

And during our stay, we had multiple requests and everything was handled. Super convenient.
Everyone is super sweet and professional! We were so thankful to have them during our stay.

My friends and I would love to come back on our next Lombok Holiday 🙏🏻🥰
title: THE MOST AMAZING STAY IN LOMBOK, BEYOND OUR EXPECTATIONS!

text: The best hotel in lombok!!!  And the services is marvelous, room was very clean.  Location is very good, food is very delicious, with this hotel you can’t never be wrong, thank you mbak ulfa and sasa
title: The best hotel

text:
The view is breathtaking. Daydreaming with sea view all day even when I am on working hour is one of the best thing I have done in 2022. Would love to come back here soon 😍.
Ps: I really love taking picture in this resort, the whole resort is gorgeous as hell 😍
title: My best stay so far in my life

text:
Excellent, me and my wife very enjoyfull stay in royal avila, full of service and the employee very friendly
This hotel very nice, very comfortable, beautiful, and lots spots for to take a picture.
And also the hotel can go ditectly to the beach 🥰
title: Workshop

text: Very sure this is the best hotel in Senggigi, or even in Lombok, both by service and design. Make sure to try the swimming pool, and go to the beach club down below. There’s also a gallery that sell stuff like bikinis, hats, sandals, etc, at a very reasonable price. Kudos to the developer and management.
title: Simply Perfect!

text: This place is amazing if you plan in a honeymoon getaway. The rooms are very clean, spacious and plenty of facilities for you to utilise during your stay here. I come here as a solo traveller and I don’t see why you shouldn’t make this a consideration for you next stay should you visit Lombok.
title: Good vibes and views

photos.caption: View from the Room at Level 2

text: I had great experience at Royal Avila. if you are into modern style hotel with reasonable price, this is the best option to consider in Senggigi area. All rooms are facing the ocean. You can enjoy the sunset and the ocean from the terrace of your room or while relaxing at the pool and/or the beach club. The staff are really friendly.
title: Stunning spot for sunset

photos.caption: It is as it is, no filter.

text:
Best ocean view, best room, and also have to try their spa & jacuzzi as well! Really nice. And the Food taste great! The swimming pool is also have a great view! Friendly & knowledgeable customer service!
Since its new so its not too crowded so its great. Overall 5/5 for me.
title: Superb! Recommended!

text:
We had a great time. The food was great and the room was clean and comfortable.
It is a beautiful place where you can enjoy the wiew and take a swim. The staf was also polite and helpful. 
Highly recommended
title: Wonderful stay

text: They have beautiful and comfy room with beatiful view. You should try their excelent food. Feel a lunch with best view ever! And thankyou to all helpful staffs. We would like to spend more night here. Best 👍
title: Royal Avila Boutique Resort Lombok

text: One of the best hotel I've ever visited. Beautiful view. Quite. Feel so private. The facility is great. The room was so clean. The staff were very niceeee... ready to help you. Definitely will go back again to this hotel next timeeee... and it's affordable. Compare to any hotel in Bali... this hotel is worth to spend your moneyyyyy👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿
title: Great beautiful hotel with the nicest staffs

text: We spent 5 great days at Royal Avila. From the moment we were met at the airport we were treated fantastically by everyone at the resort. Whoever we met ensured they remembered our name, asked how our day was and if there was anything we needed. The resort itself is beautiful. The view over the water and the pool is as good as you’ll find anywhere. The food at the restaurant was truly delicious. Can’t recommend this place enough!
title: Great first time in Lombok

text:
"Accidentally" book this resort turns out i had a wonderful stay. 
Amazing view, friendly and super helpful staff, i love everything about this place. 
Definitely will come back in the future. 
Try it if you come to Lombok, you won't regret your stay experience.
title: A wonderful resort in Lombok

text: Amazing hotel! Definitely a perfect place to stay in Lombok, we have our own private spot to see the sunset from our balcony room. The service is spot on! The food is superrrr good! Everything is perfect and amazing, definitely super recommended!
title: Ms

text: This hotel is amazing! I love every detail of it. The gym and infinity pool at sunset seem like they are straight out of a movie. The food is exquisite and the staff is so helpful. I could not have asked for a better place to stay. Ulfa you were so helpful and I thank you very much for all you did for us. 10/10 rating and hope to return very soon!
title: Santorini vibes in Lombok

text: So beautiful hotel, cozy, beach front hotel, so friendly.i think this hotel is one of the best in senggigi. Nice room, spacious and clean. View is amazing you can  see the sunset here. And our room is the sunset point.. thanks to wonderful experience..
title: Amazing

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. / Mrs. Alfainklix,

Greetings from Royal Avila Boutique Resort

Thank you for taking your valued time to be writing the review for us. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed and had a remarkable experience! Thank you for all the compliments addressed to our facilities. It is very much appreciated. We hope to welcome you back in Royal Avila Boutique Resort in the near future.

If there is anything we can assist you with, kindly let us know any time.

Yours sincerely,
The Team of Royal Avila Boutique Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stay here is the best choice if you visit lombok, best
view, best services from the staffs, hotel is clean and
you have to try "nasi goreng kambing" nya weenakk
bangett , kamar hotel yang langsung menggadap ke laut juga best view pada saat sunset , tak ragu utk kasih bintang lima untuk Riyal Avila Boutique Resort ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
title: Vacation with my little family

text: A majestic and luxury resort, that you can't help but always remembered and mesmerized by it. Great view, fantastic crew,  delicious cuisines, what an astonishing place to stay and enjoy life. This place had everything you asked for a wonderful vacation.
title: Can't Move On

text: Best view, clean, have good food, and many instagramable places inside the resort. The blue is really refresh your mind and soul. But, Right now the room service unavailable because the resort just open. And I hope will be availabe soon. With love _MrsAneto
title: Unforgetable Holiday

photos.caption: If you stay in Royal Avila, You guys will never boring. Because Royal Avila have very beautiful view inside the room. Sound of the wave, blue sky, sunset, and the endless sea will give you amazing day.

text: This hotel is still soft opening but it's good to have staycation here. Ocean view from all room. This is the best hotel with the best view, clean room, tasty food, friendly staff. I think i will be back here with my family and friends  it's a very recommended hotel in lombok
title: Best hotel
